__TOC__

* Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2011-04-20|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 8pm Irish time on Wednesday 20th of April, 2011.

* Some members of our LoCo participated in Ubuntu Global Jam Dublin hosted by TOG, the Dublin Hackerspace on the 2nd of April, 2011 from 10am till 6pm. Details <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/Events/2011|here]]</nowiki> 

* For the first time there was a second Ubuntu Global Jam event in Ireland. Other members of our LoCo participated in UGJ Limerick hosted by The University of Limerick Computer Society also on the 2nd of April, 2011 from 10am till 6pm. Details <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/Events/2011|here]]</nowiki> 

* Our Natty Narwhal Release party was held on the evening of the release date, 28 Apr 11. Details <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/Events/2011|here]]</nowiki>
